metadata.description: Citrix Optimizer Template based on the export of the VMware OSOT tool
metadata.author: EUC Solutions Architecture

entry.name: Disable SmartScreen Filter for Store Apps - User Registry
entry.description: Disable SmartScreen Filter for Store Apps - changed to selected

entry.name: Disable SmartScreen - Machine Policy
entry.description: Disable WIndows SmartScreen

entry.name: Disable Windows Defender SmartScreen - Machine Policy
entry.description: Disable Windows Defender SmartScreen

entry.name: Disable SmartScreenSpecific AppID - Scheduled Task
entry.description: Disable AppID - SmartScreenSpecific

entry.name: Prevent managing Edge SmartScreen Filter - HKLM Registry
entry.description: If the user is not prompted to turn on SmartScreen Filter. All website addresses that are not on the filterÂ´s allow list are sent automatically to Microsoft without prompting the user.

entry.name: Turn off handwriting personalization data sharing - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, Tablet PC users cannot choose to share writing samples from the handwriting recognition personalization tool with Microsoft.

entry.name: Turn off handwriting recognition error reporting - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, users cannot start the handwriting recognition error reporting tool or send error reports to Microsoft.

entry.name: Turn off the Windows Messenger Customer Experience Improvement Program - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, these tasks are removed from the File and Folder tasks in Windows folders.

entry.name: Turn off Windows Customer Experience Improvement Program - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, all users are opted out of the Windows Customer Experience Improvement Program.

entry.name: Turn off Windows Error Reporting - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, users are not given the option to report errors.

entry.name: Windows should ask for my feedback - HKCU Registry
entry.description: Never let windows ask for my feedback.

entry.name: Turn Off Find My Device - Machine Policy
entry.description: When Find My Device is off, the device and its location are not registered and the Find My Device feature will not work.

entry.name: Disable Windows Error Reporting - Service
entry.description: Error reporting services leveraged by Applications when they crash to send reports to Microsoft. If using DER within VDI consider alternate configuration.

entry.name: Disable QueueReporting - Scheduled Task
entry.description: Disable QueueReporting

entry.name: Disable DmClient - Scheduled Task
entry.description: Disable DmClient

entry.name: Disable Send Windows Error Reports - Machine Policy
entry.description: Disable send additional info with error reports

entry.name: Disable Last Logon Info - Machine Policy
entry.description: Disable displaying information about previous logons and logon failures to the user.

entry.name: Disable Find My Device - HKLM Regsitry
entry.description: Turn off find my device.

entry.name: Stop automatically sending memory dumps for OS-generated error reports - Machine Policy
entry.description: Stop automatically sending memory dumps for OS-generated error reports

entry.name: Turn off the advertising ID - Machine Policy
entry.description: Prevent apps from using the ID for experiences across apps

entry.name: Turn off Inventory Collector - Machine Policy
entry.description: Inventory Collector will be turned off and data will not be sent to Microsoft

entry.name: Turn off Let websites provide locally relevant content by accessing my language list - HKCU Registry
entry.description: Turn off Let websites provide locally relevant content by accessing my language list.

entry.name: Turn off Let your apps automatically share and sync info with wireless devices that donât explicitly pair with your PC, tablet, or phone - HKCU Registry
entry.description: Turn off Let your apps automatically share and sync info with wireless devices that donât explicitly pair with your PC, tablet, or phone.

entry.name: Disable Use sign-in info to auto finish setting up device - Machine Policy
entry.description: Disable Use sign-in info to auto finish setting up device

entry.name: Disable Privacy Experience - Machine Policy
entry.description: Disable Privacy Experience

entry.name: Turn off Let apps use advertising ID to make ads more interesting to you based on your app usage - HKCU Registry
entry.description: Turn off Let apps use advertising ID.

entry.name: Disable Edge sending history - Machine Policy
entry.description: Do not allow Edge sending intranet or internet history

entry.name: Do not harvest contacts - HKCU Registry
entry.description: Do not scan contact informations.

entry.name: Disable Text Collection - Machine Policy
entry.description: Turn Off Inking and Typing Personalization(1/2)

entry.name: Disable Ink Collection - Machine Policy
entry.description: Turn Off Inking and Typing Personalization(2/2)

entry.name: Disable sending a specific set of diagnostic data to Microsoft - Machine Policy
entry.description: Disable organizations to send Microsoft a specific set of diagnostic data via Windows Analytics services

entry.name: Do not show feedback notifications - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, users will no longer see feedback notifications through the Windows Feedback app.

entry.name: Disable Linguistic Collection - Machine Policy
entry.description: This policy setting controls the ability to send inking and typing data to Microsoft to improve the language recognition

entry.name: Turn off Automatically send memory dumps for OS-generated error reports - Machine Policy
entry.description: Disable this policy, then all memory dumps are uploaded according to the default consent and notification settings.

entry.name: Disable Windows Error Reporting - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, Windows Error Reporting does not send any problem information to Microsoft. Additionally, solution information is not available in Security and Maintenance in Control Panel.

entry.name: Disable extended telemetry for the Books tab - Machine Policy
entry.description: Microsoft Edge only sends basic telemetry data

entry.name: Disable Office Telemetry Agent FallBack 2016 - Scheduled Task
entry.description: Disable Office Telemetry Agent FallBack 2016

entry.name: Disable Microsoft Compatibility Telemetry - Scheduled Task
entry.description: Disable Microsoft Compatibility Telemetry

entry.name: Disable Office Telemetry Agent LogOn 2016 - Scheduled Task
entry.description: Disable Office Telemetry Agent LogOn 2016

entry.name: Turn off Application Telemetry - Machine Policy
entry.description: Turn off Application Telemetry

entry.name: Disable Telemetry Collection - Machine Policy
entry.description: Disable Telemetry Collection

entry.name: Do not Accept Privacy Policy - HKCU Registry
entry.description: Not accepted privacy policy.

entry.name: Disable pre-release features or settings - Machine Policy
entry.description: Disable this policy, all experimentations will be turned off.

entry.name: Disable user control over Insider builds - Machine Policy
entry.description: Disable this policy, Windows Insider Program settings will be unavailable to users through the Settings app.

entry.description: Disable Scanning for updates as User

entry.description: Enable this policy, Windows Update scan access is removed.

entry.name: Turn off access to all Windows Update features - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy setting, all Windows Update features are removed.

entry.name: Do not connect to any Windows Update Internet locations - Machine Policy
entry.description: This policy applies only when this PC is configured to connect to an intranet update service using the specify intranet Microsoft update service location policy.

entry.description: Disable using your machine for sending windows updates to others

entry.description: Disable Office 2016 Update Feature

entry.name: Turn off Windows Update device driver searching - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, Windows Update is not searched when a new device is installed.

entry.name: Allow Automatic Updates immediate installation - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, Automatic Updates will immediately install these updates once they are downloaded and ready to install.

entry.description: Stop Preview Builds and Feature Updates receiving

entry.description: Stop Preview Builds and Feature Updates receiving

entry.description: Stop Preview Builds and Feature Updates receiving

entry.description: Stop Preview Builds and Feature Updates receiving

entry.name: Disable preview builds - Machine Policy
entry.description: It will prevent preview builds from installing on the device

entry.name: Disable preview builds Policy - Machine Policy
entry.description: It will prevent preview builds from installing on the device

entry.description: Set wallpaper to solid color for current user (default value is blue).

entry.description: Set solid color to theme file

entry.description: Disable Hardware Acceleration (GPU Rendering) for Microsoft Office 2010 if there's no hardware GPU

entry.description: Disable Edge hardware acceleration

entry.description: Disable Hardware Acceleration (GPU Rendering) for Microsoft Internet Explorer if there's no hardware GPU

entry.name: Remove DOTNETFRAMEWORKS Setup - HKLM Registry
entry.description: Remove DOTNETFRAMEWORKS setup from Personalized Settings. Optimize this item will shorten new user first login time.

entry.description: Disable .NET Framework NGEN v4.0.30319

entry.name: Disable .NET Framework NGEN v4.0.30319 64 - Scheduled Task

entry.description: Disable .NET Framework NGEN v4.0.30319 64 Critical

entry.name: Turn off suggestions for all user-installed providers - Machine Policy
entry.description: Turn off suggestions for all user-installed providers

entry.name: Disable Internet Explorer Enhanced Security - HKLM Registry
entry.description: Disable Internet Explorer Enhanced Security.

entry.name: Disable IE Customization Wizard - Machine Policy
entry.description: Removes the customization wizard upon first launch of Internet Explorer

entry.name: Disable Background Synchronization - Machine Policy
entry.description: Turn off background synchronization for feeds and Web Slices

entry.name: Turn off the next pre-loaded page of a website - Machine Policy
entry.description: Turn off the flip ahead with page prediction feature

entry.name: Disable animations in web pages - Machine Policy
entry.description: Only animated GIF files are affected by this setting

entry.name: AutoRecover 2s delay - Machine Policy
entry.description: Specify idle time to 2s before AutoRecover saved

entry.name: Specify blank page for a new tab of IE - Machine Policy
entry.description: Specify blank page as IE default behavior for a new tab

entry.name: Turn off loading websites and content in the background - Machine Policy
entry.description: IE doesnÂ´t load any websites or content in the background, speeding up performance such that when the user clicks a hyperlink, the background page seamlessly switches into view.

entry.name: Disable Periodic Check for Internet Explorer software updates - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, it prevents Internet Explorer from checking to see whether it is the latest available browser version and notifying users if a new version is available.

entry.name: Disable showing the splash screen - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, the splash screen, which displays the program name, licensing, and copyright information, is not displayed.

entry.name: Disable install new versions of Internet Explorer automatically - Machine Policy
entry.description: Disable this policy, automatic upgrade of Internet Explorer will be turned off.

entry.name: Prevent participation in the Customer Experience Improvement Program - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, the user cannot participate in the CEIP, and the Customer Feedback Options command does not appear on the Help menu.

entry.name: Set tab process growth to low - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, set the rate at which Internet Explorer creates new tab processes to low.

entry.name: Turn off Suggested Sites - Machine Policy
entry.description: Disable this policy, the entry points and functionality associated with this feature are turned off.

entry.name: Prevent automatic discovery of feeds and Web Slices - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, the user does not receive a notification on the toolbar that a feed or Web Slice is available.

entry.name: Set home page to be blank for IE - Current User(1/2) - Machine Policy
entry.description: Set home page to be blank for IE - Current User(1/2)

entry.name: Set home page to be blank for IE - Current User(2/2) - Machine Policy
entry.description: Set home page to be blank for IE - Current User(2/2)

entry.name: Remove Microsoft Internet Explorer ClearIconCache Setup - HKLM Registry
entry.description: Remove Microsoft Internet Explorer ClearIconCache setup from Personlized Settings. Optimize this item will shorten new user first login time.

entry.name: Remove Microsoft Internet Explorer Initializer Setup - HKLM Registry
entry.description: Remove Microsoft Internet Explorer Initializer setup from Personalized Settings. Optimize this item will shorten new user first login time. - changed

entry.name: Do Not Show First Use Dialog Boxes - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, the anchor window is hidden when the Player is in skin mode.

entry.name: Prevent Media Sharing - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, any user on this computer is prevented from sharing digital media content from Windows Media Player with other computers and devices that are on the same network.

entry.name: Remove Microsoft Windows Media Player 7 or later Setup - HKLM Registry
entry.description: Remove Microsoft Windows Media Player 7 or later setup from Personalized Settings. Optimize this item will shorten new user first login time. - changed

entry.description: Disable All periodic network traffic by Microsoft Edge Update

entry.description: Disable Edge autoplay - HKLM

entry.description: Disable Office Background Task Handler Registration

entry.description: Turn off account privacy notifications in Office 365 and Office 2019.

entry.description: Remove OneDrive Icon from Navigation Pane of This PC.

entry.description: Remove OneDrive Icon from 'Browser' dialog box such as Save, Save as or Open in some 3rd party 32-bit programs.

entry.description: Disable Microsoft OneDrive startup run

entry.description: Remove OneDrive.

entry.description: Remove OneDrive Setup.

entry.name: Prevent the usage of OneDrive for file storage - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, apps and features can not work with OneDrive file storage.

entry.name: Save documents to OneDrive by default - Machine Policy
entry.description: Disable this policy, files will be saved locally by default.

entry.name: Prevent OneDrive network traffic - HKLM Registry
entry.description: Prevent OneDrive from generating network traffic until the user signs in to OneDrive.

entry.name: Stop Server Manager at logon - HKCU Registry
entry.description: Stop Server Manager at logon.

entry.name: Server Manager - Machine Policy
entry.description: Disable Server Manager.

entry.name: Turn off the offer to update to the latest version of Windows - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, the Store application will not offer updates to the latest version of Windows.

entry.name: Turn off Automatic Download of updates - Machine Policy
entry.description: If you enable this setting, automatic download of updates is turned off.

entry.description: Disable Application Experience - Microsoft Compatibility Appraiser

entry.description: Disable Application Experience - ProgramDataUpdator

entry.name: Disable StartupAppTask - Scheduled Task
entry.description: Disable Application Experience - StartupAppTask

entry.name: Disable PcaPatchDBTask - Scheduled Task
entry.description: Disable Application Experience - PcaPatchDBTask

entry.name: Disable CEIP Consolidator - Scheduled Task
entry.description: Disable Customer Experience Improvement Program (CEIP) scheduled task

entry.name: Disable CEIP Kernel - Scheduled Task
entry.description: Disable Customer Exeprience Improvement Program (CEIP) scheduled task

entry.name: Disable CEIP USB- Scheduled Task
entry.description: Disable Customer Exeprience Improvement Program (CEIP) scheduled task

entry.name: Do not send a Windows error report when a generic driver is installed on a device - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, an error report is not sent when a generic driver is installed.

entry.name: Prevent creation of a system restore point during device activity that would normally prompt creation of a restore point - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, Windows does not create a system restore point when one would normally be created.

entry.name: Prevent device metadata retrieval from the Internet - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, Windows does not retrieve device metadata for installed devices from the Internet.

entry.name: Prevent Windows from sending an error report when a device driver requests additional software during installation - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this Policy, Windows does not send an error report to request additional software even if this is specified by the device driver.

entry.name: Turn off "Found New Hardware" balloons during device installation - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, "Found New Hardware" balloons do not appear while a device is being installed.

entry.name: Disable Payments and NFC/SE Manager - Service
entry.description: Disable Payments and NFC/SE Manager Service

entry.name: Use WDDM graphics display driver for Remote Desktop Connections - Machine Policy
entry.description: This policy setting lets you enable WDDM graphics display driver for Remote Desktop Connections.

entry.name: Disable USB Notifications - Scheduled Task
entry.description: Disable Usb Notifications

entry.name: Maximum size of Active Directory searches - User Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, set Number of objects returned to 5000.

entry.name: Prevent the computer from joining a homegroup - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, users cannot add computers to a homegroup. This policy setting does not affect other network sharing features.

entry.name: Turn off Automatic Download and Update of Map Data - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, the automatic download and update of map data is turned off.

entry.name: Turn off unsolicited network traffic on the Offline Maps settings page - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, features that generate network traffic on the Offline Maps settings page are turned off. Note: This may turn off the entire settings page.

entry.name: Don't allow Message Service Cloud Sync - Machine Policy
entry.description: Don't allow backup and restore of cellular text messages to MicrosoftÂ´s cloud services.

entry.name: Delivery Optimization downloads using HTTP only - Machine Policy
entry.description: Delivery Optimization downloads using HTTP only

entry.name: Turn off Event Viewer "Events.asp" links - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, event description hyperlinks are not activated and the text "More Information" is not displayed at the end of the description.

entry.name: Turn off Help and Support Center "Did you know?" content - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, Help and Support Center no longer retrieves nor displays "Did you know?" content.

entry.name: Turn off Help and Support Center Microsoft Knowledge Base search - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, it removes the Knowledge Base section from the Help and Support Center "Set search options" page, and only Help content on the local computer is searched.

entry.name: Turn off Internet Connection Wizard if URL connection is referring to Microsoft.com - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, the "Choose a list of Internet Service Providers" path in the Internet Connection Wizard causes the wizard to exit. This prevents users from retrieving the list of ISPs, which resides on Microsoft servers.

entry.name: Turn off Internet download for Web publishing and online ordering wizards - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, Windows does not download providers, and only the service providers that are cached in the local registry are displayed.

entry.name: Turn off Internet File Association service - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, the link and the dialog for using the Web service to open an unhandled file association are removed.

entry.name: Turn off Registration if URL connection is referring to Microsoft.com - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, it blocks users from connecting to Microsoft.com for online registration and users cannot register their copy of Windows online.

entry.name: Turn off the "Order Prints" picture task - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, the task "Order Prints Online" is removed from Picture Tasks in File Explorer folders.

entry.name: Turn off the "Publish to Web" task for files and folders - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, these tasks are removed from the File and Folder tasks in Windows folders.

entry.name: Turn on BranchCache - Machine Policy
entry.description: Disable this policy, turn off BranchCache for all client computers where the policy is applied.

entry.name: Enable Hotspot Authentication - Machine Policy
entry.description: Disable this policy, WLAN hotspots are not probed for WISPr protocol support, and users can only authenticate with WLAN hotspots using a web browser.

entry.name: Turn off Microsoft Peer-to-Peer Networking Services - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, Turn off peer-to-peer protocols.

entry.name: Disable Windows Filtering Platform BfeonServiceStartTypeChange - Scheduled Task
entry.description: Disable BfeonServiceStartTypeChange

entry.name: Disable WWAN Notification - Scheduled Task
entry.description: Disable Notification Task

entry.name: Disable Windows Mobile Hotspot - Service
entry.description: Provides the ability to share a cellular data connection with another device.

entry.name: Disable Data Usage - Service
entry.description: Network data usage, data limit, restrict background data, metered networks.

entry.name: Disable WiFi - Scheduled Task
entry.description: Disable WiFi Task

entry.name: Disable UPnPHostConfig - Scheduled Task
entry.description: Disable UPnP - UPnPHostConfig

entry.description: Disable Provisioning Cellular

entry.description: Disable Mobile Broadband Accounts - MNO Metadata Parser

entry.description: Disable Ras - MobilityManager

entry.description: Disable Autochk - Proxy

entry.description: Disable CIFS Change Notifications

entry.name: Disable IPv6 - HKLM Registry
entry.description: Disable IPv6

entry.name: Disable Choose Network Location - HKLM Registry
entry.description: Creates a blank key that disables the "Choose default network location" prompt.

entry.name: Turn off Automatically connect to suggested open hotspots - HKLM Registry
entry.description: Turn off Automatically connect to suggested open hotspots.

entry.name: Enable Network Category ReadOnly - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable Network Category ReadOnly

entry.name: Turn off KMS Client Online AVS Validation - Machine Policy
entry.description: Turn off KMS Client Online AVS Validation

entry.name: Don't allow Windows apps access cellular data - Machine Policy
entry.description: Don't allow Windows apps access cellular data

entry.name: Disable Retail Demo - Service
entry.description: The Retail Demo service controls device activity while the device is in retail demo mode.

entry.name: Remove Microsoft Outlook MailNews Express Setup - HKLM Registry
entry.description: Remove Microsoft Outlook MailNews Express setup from Personalized Settings. Optimize this item will shorten new user first login time.

entry.name: Remove Windows Desktop Update Setup - HKLM Registry
entry.description: Remove Windows Desktop Update setup from Personalized Settings. Optimize this item will shorten new user first login time.

entry.description: Disable FileHistory - File History

entry.name: Disable Location WindowsActionDialog - Scheduled Task
entry.description: Disable Location - WindowsActionDialog

entry.name: Turn off Active Help - Machine Policy
entry.description: Turn off Active Help

entry.name: Prevent Windows automatically transitioning to sleep - Machine Policy
entry.description: Do not prevent Windows from automatically transitioning to sleep

entry.name: Disable turn off hard disk after - HKLM Regsitry
entry.description: Remove turn off hard disk after

entry.name: Select an active power plan - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, specify the High Performance power plan.

entry.description: Shorten timeout of desktop session switch

entry.name: Shorten wait time of folder redirection to 0s - Machine Policy
entry.description: Shorten wait time of folder redirection

entry.description: Hide entry points for Fast User Switching

entry.description: Allow Microsoft accounts to be optional

entry.name: Do not check for user ownership of Roaming Profile Folders - Machine Policy
entry.description: Do not check for user ownership of Roaming Profile Folders

entry.name: Delete User App Containers On Log off - HKLM Registry
entry.description: Addresses an issue that slows server performance or causes the server to stop responding because of numerous Windows firewall rules.

entry.name: Disable Superfetch - Service
entry.description: Service is leveraged to optimize loading of applications over time. In a non persistent or commodity based VDI environment this service may impact performance. Depends on use and organization.

entry.description: Disable Space Agent Task

entry.name: Disable Space Manager - Scheduled Task
entry.description: Disable Space Manager Task

entry.name: Disable Distributed Link Tracking Client - Service
entry.description: Disable Distributed Link Tracking Client Service

entry.name: Don't allow downloading updates to the Disk Failure Prediction Model - Machine Policy
entry.description: Updates would not be downloaded for the Disk Failure Prediction Failure Model.

entry.name: Do not allow restore of system to default state - Machine Policy
entry.description: Enable this policy, allow the user to restore the computer to the original state or from a user-created system image.

entry.name: Disable Syspart Repair - Command
entry.description: Disable Syspart Repair

entry.description: Disable disk footprint diagnostics

entry.name: Disable DiskFootprint StorageSense - Scheduled Task
entry.description: Disable StorageSense

entry.description: Disable DiskCleanup - SilentCleanup

entry.name: Disable Chkdsk ProactiveScan - Scheduled Task
entry.description: Disable Chkdsk - ProactiveScan

entry.name: Disable reset base for DISM - HKLM Registry
entry.description: Disable reset base for DISM

entry.name: Disable Boot Optimize Function - HKLM Registry
entry.description: Disable windows automatically optimizes the file location for boot optimization.

entry.name: Disable creation of Crash Dump - HKLM Registry
entry.description: Removes the creation of a Crash Dump file

entry.name: Increase Service Startup Timeout - HKLM Registry
entry.description: Allows up to 120 seconds before timing out waiting for a service

entry.name: Disable Reserved Storage - HKLM Registry
entry.description: Disable Reserved Storage

entry.name: Disable Storage Sense - Machine Policy
entry.description: Disable Storage Sense.

entry.name: Turn off System Restore - Machine Policy
entry.description: System Restore is turned off, and the System Restore Wizard cannot be accessed.

entry.name: Disable Reliability WMI Providers - Machine Policy
entry.description: Disable this policy, Reliability Monitor will not display system reliability information, and WMI-capable applications will be unable to access reliability information from the listed providers.

entry.name: Disable Windows Standby/Resume Performance Diagnostics - Machine Policy
entry.description: Windows cannot detect, troubleshoot, and attempt to resolve automatically Windows Standby/Resume Performance Diagnostics problems that are handled by the DPS.

entry.name: Configure Scenario Execution Level 1/6 - Machine Policy
entry.description: Disable this policy, Windows will not be able to detect, troubleshoot or resolve any Windows Resource Exhaustion problems that are handled by the DPS.

entry.name: Configure Scenario Execution Level 2/6 - Machine Policy
entry.description: Disable this policy, Windows will not be able to detect, troubleshoot or resolve any Windows Shutdown Performance problems that are handled by the DPS.

entry.name: Configure Scenario Execution Level 3/6 - Machine Policy
entry.description: Disable this policy, Windows will not be able to detect, troubleshoot or resolve any Windows Standby/Resume Performance problems that are handled by the DPS.

entry.name: Lower Scenario Execution Level 5/6 - Machine Policy
entry.description: Windows cannot detect, troubleshoot, and attempt to resolve automatically any heap corruption problems that are handled by the DPS.

entry.name: Configure Scenario Execution Level 6/6 - Machine Policy
entry.description: Disable this policy, the DPS is not able to diagnose memory leak problems.

entry.name: Configure Scenario Execution Level - Machine Policy
entry.description: Disable this policy, Windows will not be able to detect, troubleshoot or resolve any Windows Boot Performance problems that are handled by the DPS.

entry.name: Disable Windows Boot Performance Diagnostics(1/2) - Machine Policy
entry.description: Windows cannot detect, troubleshoot, and attempt to resolve automatically Windows Boot Performance Diagnostics problems that are handled by the DPS.

entry.name: Disable Windows Boot Performance Diagnostics(2/2) - Machine Policy
entry.description: Windows cannot detect, troubleshoot, and attempt to resolve automatically Windows Boot Performance Diagnostics problems that are handled by the DPS.

entry.name: Disable Scheduled Maintenance Diagnostics - Machine Policy
entry.description: Disable this policy, Windows will not be able to detect, troubleshoot or resolve problems on a scheduled basis.

entry.name: Disable scheduled diagnostics - Machine Policy
entry.description: Windows will not be able to detect, troubleshoot or resolve problems on a scheduled basis.

entry.name: Clear Scheduled Tasks
entry.description: Clear out any remaining Scheduled Tasks
